bioAsHtml: Coder, reverse-engineer, hardware hacker. Failed entrepreneur of the 2000's dot-com era, I joined Lyra Network as its 3rd employee (or 5th element), to eventually turn this startup into a highly successful FinTech company. Fast-forward 10 years later, I've been the head of development of a software engineering team of 50+ talented persons, and I am now a self-entitled "gentleman innovator" trying to push ideas and projects forward, be they in Lyra Network's field of expertise, or not. I'm also a long-time member of silicium.org, a software and hardware preservation association.

acceptedTalks.title: La Nintendo NES Classic Mini - Ce qu'elle aurait pu (dû ?) être. De l'émulation software à l'émulation hardware avec un FPGA.

bio:
Coder, reverse-engineer, hardware hacker. Failed entrepreneur of the 2000's dot-com era, I joined Lyra Network as its 3rd employee (or 5th element), to eventually turn this startup into a highly successful FinTech company. Fast-forward 10 years later, I've been the head of development of a software engineering team of 50+ talented persons, and I am now a self-entitled "gentleman innovator" trying to push ideas and projects forward, be they in Lyra Network's field of expertise, or not.
I'm also a long-time member of silicium.org, a software and hardware preservation association.
